nodes.text: Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption Expansion: Prima Official Game Guide

The Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption Expansion: Prima Official Game Guide is a 384-page paperback book designed to help the gamer through the Star Wars: Empire at War: Forces of Corruption game, as well as the original Star Wars: Empire at War. It was written by Michael Knight and published by Prima Games on October 24, 2006.
The book restates much of the content of the original game's strategy guide and adds information about Zann Consortium tactics and units.
